title: Phase 4: Visualization & Interactive Analysis
description: Build interactive visualization system comparing SSL attention patterns against 631 expert-annotated bounding boxes on 139 WikiChurches images. Combines Phase 4 (static visualization) and Phase 6 (interactive demo).
close_reason: Phase 4 implementation complete: visualization module, pre-computation scripts, FastAPI backend, React frontend, Docker setup

title: Step 3: FastAPI backend
description: Create app/backend/ with FastAPI app, CORS, image serving, attention/heatmap endpoints, metrics endpoints, and comparison endpoints.
close_reason: Created FastAPI backend with image, attention, metrics, and comparison endpoints

title: Expose attention method selection (CLS/Rollout/GradCAM) in UI
description: Rollout implemented: src/ssl_attention/attention/rollout.py. GradCAM implemented: src/ssl_attention/attention/gradcam.py. Only CLS attention is currently in precompute and UI. Need to: 1) Update app/precompute/generate_attention_cache.py to generate all 3 methods, 2) Add method parameter to /api/attention endpoints, 3) Add method selector to ControlPanel.tsx

title: Expose per-feature-type IoU breakdown in interactive tool
description: Backend functions exist: compute_per_bbox_iou(), aggregate_by_feature_type() in src/ssl_attention/metrics/iou.py. Need API endpoint: /api/metrics/model/{model}/feature_breakdown. Need frontend component to display 106 feature types breakdown.

title: Step 4: React frontend
description: Create app/frontend/ with Vite + React + TypeScript, shadcn/ui + Tailwind, API client, pages (Home, ImageDetail, Compare, Dashboard), and layer progression animation.
close_reason: Created React frontend with TypeScript, Vite, Tailwind CSS, Zustand, React Query, and Recharts

title: Implement metrics/statistics.py - paired tests and CIs
Add ResNet-50 supervised baseline for SSL vs supervised comparison
description: Implement ImageNet-pretrained ResNet-50 as non-SSL reference baseline. Required to validate that attention alignment is specific to SSL training. Needed for ablation: 'Do SSL models specifically attend to expert features, or is this a general ViT property?' Files to create: src/ssl_attention/models/resnet50.py

title: Step 5: Docker setup
description: Create Dockerfiles for backend/frontend, docker-compose for local development, document Railway deployment steps.
close_reason: Created Dockerfiles for backend and frontend with docker-compose for local development

title: Support per-model layer counts in UI
description: The UI uses a global NUM_LAYERS=12, but ResNet-50 only has 4 stages/layers. The /models endpoint should return per-model layer counts, and the frontend should adapt the layer slider range based on the selected model. Currently the UI shows layers 0-11 for ResNet-50, but only layers 0-3 exist (404 for others).

title: Create fine_tuning.py module with dataclasses and ClassificationHead
Add colormap legend to similarity heatmap display
description:
Phase 5 polish item: Add a visual colormap legend showing the similarity scale (0 to 1) next to the heatmap overlay.

The renderHeatmapLegend() function already exists in renderHeatmap.ts but is not yet integrated into the UI.

title: Step 1: Static visualization utilities
description: Create src/ssl_attention/visualization/ with heatmaps.py, overlays.py, plots.py for generating attention heatmaps with colormaps, combining heatmaps with images and bboxes, and statistical comparison charts.
close_reason: Created visualization module with heatmaps.py, overlays.py, plots.py

title: Step 2: Pre-computation infrastructure
description: Create app/precompute/ scripts: generate_attention_cache.py, generate_heatmap_images.py, generate_metrics_cache.py. Pre-compute 16,680 attention maps, 33,360 heatmap PNGs, and per-image metrics.
close_reason: Created pre-computation scripts for attention cache, heatmap images, and metrics cache

title: Implement metrics/iou.py - IoU and coverage metrics
Implement Phase 2: Data Pipeline
close_reason: Implemented Phase 2 data pipeline: config updates, data/ package (annotations.py, wikichurches.py), cache/ package (manager.py), fixed style mapping docs

title: Phase 1: Core Infrastructure Implementation
description: Build foundational ML infrastructure for comparing SSL model attention patterns. Includes model wrappers for 5 SSL models (DINOv2, DINOv3, MAE, CLIP, SigLIP 2) with unified attention extraction.
close_reason: Phase 1 infrastructure complete: 5 model wrappers, attention extractors, registry with caching

title: Extract per-layer features instead of final layer only
description:
Current limitation: generate_feature_cache.py stores the same final-layer features for all layer keys. 

For more accurate per-layer similarity analysis, the script should hook into each transformer layer to extract intermediate features. This would require modifying the model forward pass to capture hidden states at each layer.

Impact: Currently, changing the layer slider won't show different similarity patterns since all layers use the same features.

title: Run generate_feature_cache.py to populate feature cache
description:
The interactive bbox similarity feature requires precomputed patch features. Run:

```bash
python -m app.precompute.generate_feature_cache --models all
```

This will generate ~4.9 GB of cached features in outputs/cache/features.h5
close_reason: Feature cache generated successfully: 4.7GB, 8340 entries across 5 models
